backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a WhatsApp/Call number update and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and role in the landing page app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all landing sections in order.
frontend/src/components/landing/Benefits: Renders benefit cards using icons and content from landingContent within a styled section.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Client‑side validated contact form with success state and field-level error handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section offering WhatsApp and Call actions plus an embedded contact form.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with logo, tagline, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with logo header, headline, CTA button, trust points, and illustration image.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Exports static landing page content including hero text, benefits, pricing tiers, testimonials, trust badges, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingS: Reusable layout wrapper providing consistent spacing, titles, and styling for each landing page section.
frontend/src/components/landing/PricingS: Displays pricing tiers with feature lists and CTAs, highlighting a recommended package.
frontend/src/components/landing/Testimon: Renders a testimonials grid using cards, pulling testimonial data and displaying ratings, quotes, and client info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the current Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for shadows and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, shadows, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, goals, visual direction, requirements, and implemented features for the landing page.
